caption: Antonio Circignani (Italian, 1560–1620), formerly attributed to Marcantonio Franceschini (Bologna 1648–1729 Bologna), Chiron and Achilles. Black chalk over stylus underdrawing, with brush and gray-brown wash, heightened with white, on gray-green laid paper; 27.7 × 41.4 cm. Museum purchase (x1958-79)
